sentences.simplifiedText: 我怀疑他是不是真的忙。
sentences.traditionalText: 我懷疑他是不是真的忙。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ huáiyí tā shì bùshì zhēn de máng.
sentences.translation: I doubt if he is really busy.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在缺乏明确证据的情况下，请不要随便怀疑他人。
sentences.traditionalText: 在缺乏明確證據的情況下，請不要隨便懷疑他人。
sentences.pinyin: Zài quēfá míngquè zhèngjù de qíngkuàng xià, qǐng bùyào suíbiàn huáiyí tārén.
sentences.translation: Please don't randomly doubt others in the absence of clear evidence.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ duì tā de huà yǒu huáiyí.
sentences.translation: I have my doubts about what he said.

sentences.simplifiedText: 鉴于以前的经历，他对这种声称持有怀疑的态度。
sentences.traditionalText: 鑑於以前的經歷，他對這種聲稱持有懷疑的態度。
sentences.pinyin: Jiànyú yǐqián de jīnglì, tā duì zhè zhǒng shēngchēng chí yǒu huáiyí de tàidù.
sentences.translation: Given prior experience, he holds a skeptical attitude towards such claims.

sentences.simplifiedText: 鉴于他总是表现得很神秘，我开始怀疑他是不是有什么需要隐藏的秘密。
sentences.traditionalText: 鑒於他總是表現得很神秘，我開始懷疑他是不是有什麼需要隱藏的秘密。
sentences.pinyin: jiànyú tā zǒng shì biǎoxiàn dé hěn shénmì, wǒ kāishǐ huáiyí tā shì búshì yǒu shé me xūyào yǐncáng de mìmì.
sentences.translation: Given that he always acts very mysteriously, I begin to suspect if he has some secrets that need to hide.
